author: therepublic.com
title: Ground News - After victim 'devastated' by trike theft, deputies rolled in to help
text: Bartholomew County sheriff deputies responded in more ways than one after someone stole an adult tricycle belonging to a man with Down syndrome At about 4:29 p.m. on Feb. 29, sheriff’s Deputy Tyler Cooper was notified of a theft on Alan Drive. When Cooper arrived on scene and met with Della Dowden, she reported that her son’s tricycle was stolen from her yard during the night of February 28. Continue reading at The Republic News.
